search.query: `demisto_get_index` source="demisto" sourcetype="demistoresponse" $severity$ | rename orig_sid as sid | join type=left sid [search index="_internal" sourcetype="scheduler" alert_actions = "demisto" $savedsearch_name$ ] | search $savedsearch_name$ $investigation_form$ | eval Severity=case(severity = 0,"Unknown",severity = 0.5,"Informational",severity = 1,"Low",severity = 2,"Medium",severity = 3,"High", severity = 4,"Critical"), Action="Create Demisto Incident", Occurred= strftime( strptime( occurred, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ" ), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),Created= strftime( strptime( created, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ" ), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), author="system", Incident ID =id, Pivot ="Demisto War Room" | rename savedsearch_name as "Savedsearch Name", investigationId as "Investigation ID", details as Details | table id, "Savedsearch Name", "Incident ID", "Investigation ID",Severity, Occurred, Created, Details, DEMISTOURL, author, Pivot, Action | fillnull value="Not Applicable" | join type=inner author [| rest /services/demisto/demistocustomendpoint | eval PORT = if (PORT ="", 443, PORT) | table author DEMISTOURL PORT ] | table "Savedsearch Name", "Incident ID", "Investigation ID",Severity, Occurred, Created, Details, DEMISTOURL, PORT, id, Pivot,Action

table.fields: Occurred, Action, "Savedsearch Name", "Incident ID", "Investigation ID",Severity, Details, Pivot
